markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Bountiful Cauldron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=506)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 71

**Price** 680 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This mid-sized, silver cauldron is a boon within areas where access to fresh food is limited, for it can be commanded to fill itself with hearty (and delicious) vegetable stew. It can also be put to a much greater use in the pursuit of crafting certain items. When used to Craft alchemical items, potions, or oils, a bountiful cauldron grants a +2 item bonus to the Crafting check.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You stir the cauldron, and it casts a 4th-level [_create food_](/Spells.aspx?ID=52) spell, filling itself with enough delicious vegetable stew to feed 12 Medium creatures.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bountiful Cauldron
